New Delhi.name: Connaught Place Bazaar
New Delhi.description: A vibrant market located in the heart of New Delhi, offering a wide range of goods from electronics to clothing. A favorite spot for shoppers and tourists.

New Delhi.name: Chandni Chowk
New Delhi.description: A historic market offering a wide range of products including textiles, jewelry, spices, and street food. A must-visit for an authentic Delhi experience.

Old Delhi.name: Sarojini Nagar Market
Old Delhi.description: A bustling market famous for its affordable fashion, accessories, and home decor items. A favorite among students and young professionals.

Old Delhi.name: Dilli Haat
Old Delhi.description: An open-air market featuring crafts, food, and cultural performances from across India. A great place to buy souvenirs and sample regional cuisine.

Pune.name: Deccan Grocers
Pune.description: A popular grocery store offering a wide range of local and international products, known for its fresh produce and reasonable prices.

Pune.name: Koregaon Park Essentials
Pune.description: A boutique store in Koregaon Park offering organic and gourmet products along with a selection of fine wines and spirits.

Pune.name: Shivaji Market
Pune.description: A historic market in Pune, known for its fresh meat, seafood, and vegetables. A favorite among locals for its authenticity.

Nagpur.name: Orange City Mart
Nagpur.description: A well-known supermarket offering fresh produce, groceries, and a variety of local delicacies. Popular among residents for its quality products.

Nagpur.name: Sitabuldi Market
Nagpur.description: A vibrant market in the heart of Nagpur, famous for its clothing, electronics, and street food. A must-visit for bargain hunters.

Nagpur.name: Dharampeth Shopping Centre
Nagpur.description: A popular shopping destination with a wide range of stores selling everything from jewelry to clothing and electronics.

Chennai.name: Express Avenue Mall
Chennai.description: A premier shopping mall in Chennai offering a mix of international and local brands, a food court, and a multiplex cinema.

Chennai.name: Pondy Bazaar
Chennai.description: A bustling shopping area in T. Nagar known for its wide range of clothing, accessories, and electronics at affordable prices.

Chennai.name: Phoenix Marketcity
Chennai.description: A large shopping mall in Velachery with a variety of retail stores, dining options, and entertainment facilities, including a cinema and play area.

Coimbatore.name: Brookefields Mall
Coimbatore.description: A popular shopping mall in Coimbatore featuring a mix of national and international brands, a food court, and entertainment options.

Coimbatore.name: RS Puram Market
Coimbatore.description: A vibrant local market in RS Puram known for its fresh produce, groceries, and a variety of everyday essentials.

Kolkata.name: Park Street Market
Kolkata.description: A bustling marketplace in the heart of Kolkata, known for its vibrant atmosphere and wide range of products including books, clothing, and handicrafts.

Kolkata.name: New Market
Kolkata.description: A historic shopping complex offering a variety of products including clothing, electronics, and food. A popular destination for locals and tourists alike.

South Kolkata.name: South City Mall
South Kolkata.description: One of the largest shopping malls in Kolkata, featuring a wide range of international and local brands, a food court, and a multiplex cinema.

South Kolkata.name: Dakshinapan Shopping Complex
South Kolkata.description: A shopping complex in South Kolkata offering a range of handicrafts, textiles, and traditional Indian clothing. Popular among those looking for ethnic wear.

Hyderabad.name: Banjara Hills Superstore
Hyderabad.description: A premium supermarket in the upscale area of Banjara Hills, offering a wide variety of gourmet products and fresh produce.

Hyderabad.name: Gachibowli Groceries
Hyderabad.description: A well-stocked grocery store in Gachibowli, popular among IT professionals and expats for its range of international products.

Hyderabad.name: Charminar Market
Hyderabad.description: A historic market near the Charminar, offering traditional clothing, jewelry, and spices. A must-visit for a taste of old Hyderabad.
